name: gusto
content:

great energy, enthusiasm, and enjoyment that is experienced by someone taking part in an activity, especially a performance: with gusto Everyone joined in the singing with great gusto. Synonyms
relish
zest

eager enjoyment experienced when doing something: We ate and drank with gusto.
